constant.name: AUG_TIPS_FORM_WIZARD
constant.description: DESIGN TIP: Not applicable to this form, but in general: large forms can be difficult to consume and complete for end users. To help with user experience, divide big forms into sections presented one step at a time or upon request. This can be done in a SAIL expression on a single user input task or start form to keep the process model simple.

typedValue.value: DESIGN TIP: Not applicable to this form, but in general: large forms can be difficult to consume and complete for end users. To help with user experience, divide big forms into sections presented one step at a time or upon request. This can be done in a SAIL expression on a single user input task or start form to keep the process model simple.
